text: Ezɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God kamaghɨn Moses mɨgei, “Datɨrɨghɨn kɨ Akar Dɨkɨrɨzir Gavgavim ia Israelia ko uam anekɨrasa. Kɨ nɨn gumazamizibar damazibar dɨgavir kuram gamir arazibar amuam. Arazir kaba, kɨ Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamizibar damazibar faragha dagh amizir puvatɨ. Kantrin igharazibar gumazamizir ia men tongɨn itiba, me arazir kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God damuamin kabar gan, egh dɨgavir kuram damuva akongɨva atiatingam.
